name: Survive The skies
description:
Survive in the clouds for as long as you can, take down the enemy generators, and do a few barrel rolls! You have a finite amount of fuel but can boost it back up by heading through the kinetic platforms. Fire at the enemy generators, and bring them down with your fire!

The idea of this game was to blend survival with a flight sim, think that one intense scene from Dunkirk, yeah, kinda like that. Hopefully, I get to expand on this idea, it was really fun to work on.

WADS: Flight controls: AD: tilt sideways WS: tilt forward

Shift: boost: will expend fuel

LMB: Aims camera RMB: Fires missiles

Space: Brakes rotation

R:restart

GUI: Right value displays fuel amount

Hope you like it! :3
